description: This file declares functions for managing Zigbee telemetry, including initialization, shutdown, and property configuration.

methods.name: zigbeeTelemetryInitialize
methods.description: Initialize the Zigbee Telemetry system, potentially starting network captures.

methods.name: zigbeeTelemetryShutdown
methods.description: Shut down the Zigbee Telemetry system, stopping any running captures and releasing resources.

methods.name: zigbeeTelemetrySetProperty
methods.description: Update a Zigbee telemetry related property which could start, stop, or change a running capture's configuration.
